title: Python Basics Workshop
speaker: Sarah Chen
description: Introduction to Python for beginners. We'll cover variables, data types, functions, and basic control flow. Perfect for those new to programming or coming from other languages. Hands-on exercises included.

title: Django Web Development
speaker: Maria K.
description: Building web apps with Django framework. Learn the MVT pattern, ORM, templates, and deployment. We'll build a complete blog application from scratch. Bring your laptop!

title: Cloud Architecture Deep Dive
speaker: Rachel Martinez
description: Advanced cloud architecture patterns for scalable applications. Topics include microservices, serverless, container orchestration, and multi-region deployments. Best practices from production systems.

title: AI and Machine Learning Intro
speaker: Priya S.
description: Introduction to AI and ML concepts. We'll explore supervised learning, neural networks basics, and practical applications. Hands-on with scikit-learn and TensorFlow. No prior ML experience needed.

title: Python for Data Science
speaker: Emma Thompson
description: Using Python for data analysis and visualization. Learn pandas, numpy, matplotlib, and seaborn. We'll work with real datasets and create beautiful visualizations.

title: Web Scraping with Python
speaker: Jessica Wang
description: Learn to extract data from websites using BeautifulSoup and Scrapy. Ethical scraping practices, handling dynamic content, and storing results.

title: RESTful APIs with Flask
speaker: Amanda Lee
description: Build REST APIs using Flask. Design endpoints, handle authentication, implement CRUD operations, and test your APIs. We'll build a complete API project.

title: Git and GitHub Workflow
speaker: Lisa Park
description: Master version control with Git. Learn branching strategies, pull requests, code reviews, and collaborative workflows. Essential skills for any developer.

title: Python Testing Best Practices
speaker: Sophie Brown
description: Write effective tests with pytest. Unit testing, integration testing, mocking, fixtures, and test coverage. Make your code more reliable and maintainable.

title: Containerization with Docker
speaker: Nina Rodriguez
description: Containerize your Python applications with Docker. Learn Dockerfile best practices, multi-stage builds, docker-compose, and deployment strategies.

title: FastAPI Modern Web APIs
speaker: Yuki Tanaka
description: Build high-performance APIs with FastAPI. Async programming, automatic documentation, type hints, and modern Python patterns. Perfect for microservices.

title: Python Security Essentials
speaker: Alex Morgan
description: Secure your Python applications. Common vulnerabilities, input validation, authentication, encryption, and security best practices. Critical for production apps.

title: Machine Learning with scikit-learn
speaker: Dr. Maya Patel
description: Practical machine learning with scikit-learn. Classification, regression, clustering, and model evaluation. Real-world projects and datasets.

title: Python Performance Optimization
speaker: Karen Kim
description: Optimize Python code for speed. Profiling, caching, async programming, and when to use C extensions. Make your code run faster.

title: Building Chatbots with Python
speaker: Michelle Zhang
description: Create intelligent chatbots using Python. Natural language processing, dialog management, and integration with messaging platforms.

title: Cloud Deployment Strategies
speaker: Jennifer Wu
description: Deploy Python applications to the cloud. AWS, GCP, and Azure comparison. CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and scaling strategies.

title: Python for Automation
speaker: Patricia Garcia
description: Automate repetitive tasks with Python. File operations, web automation with Selenium, email automation, and scheduling tasks. Save hours every week!

title: Database Design with SQLAlchemy
speaker: Rebecca Chen
description: Design and interact with databases using SQLAlchemy ORM. Models, relationships, queries, migrations, and best practices for database design.

title: Python Package Development
speaker: Stephanie Lee
description: Create and publish Python packages. Setup.py, packaging, PyPI, versioning, and distribution. Share your code with the world!

title: Advanced Python Patterns
speaker: Victoria Park
description: Master advanced Python concepts. Decorators, context managers, generators, metaclasses, and design patterns. Level up your Python skills.
